name: AudioScan
0:
”Alexa open Audio Scan”
”Alexa ask Audio Scan to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: audio scan
des:
This skill offers a unique auditory experience by playing a continuous audio sound that scans through a range of audio frequencies. Ideal for training your ears on different frequencies. Perfect for studying and relaxtion.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Audio Scan
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
